alert.note: Alert for Eastern Santa Clara Hills; Santa Clara Valley Including San Jose (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued January 05 at 11:14AM PST until January 07 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT SATURDAY NIGHT TO 10 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 30 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Santa Clara Valley, including San Jose and Eastern Santa Clara Hills. * WHEN...From midnight Saturday night to 10 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation, possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing, and create hazardous conditions for livestock and those without adequate heating or shelter.
info.instruction: People who do not have adequate heating should take steps to find shelter from the cold. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Santa Clara Hills; Santa Clara Valley Including San Jose
